forecast_days.skies: Snow And Rain. Snow And Rain

forecast.day_comments: A chance of snow showers, mainly between noon and 5pm.  Increasing clouds, with a high near 13. Wind chill values as low as -11. West wind 3 to 5 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 40%. Total daytime snow accumulation of less than a half inch possible.
forecast.night_comments: Partly cloudy, with a low around 1. Wind chill values as low as -6. West wind 3 to 6 mph.
